content: MapServer WFS Rare_Earth_Element_Deposits http://mrdata.usgs.gov/ none none ree Rare_Earth_Element_Deposits Information on mineral deposits containing rare earth elements from around the world with grade and tonnage, and mineralogy. mineral resources; mining and quarrying; mine sites; niobium; rare-earth elements; phosphorus EPSG:4326 http://mrdata.usgs.gov/metadata/ofr-2002-0189.xml
raw_content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?>
<WFS_Capabilities 
   version="1.0.0" 
   updateSequence="0" 
   xmlns="http://www.opengis.net/wfs" 
   xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" 
   xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
   xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/wfs http://schemas.opengis.net/wfs/1.0.0/WFS-capabilities.xsd">

<!-- MapServer version 6.4.0 OUTPUT=GIF OUTPUT=PNG OUTPUT=JPEG OUTPUT=KML SUPPORTS=PROJ SUPPORTS=GD SUPPORTS=AGG SUPPORTS=FREETYPE SUPPORTS=CAIRO SUPPORTS=ICONV SUPPORTS=WMS_SERVER SUPPORTS=WMS_CLIENT SUPPORTS=WFS_SERVER SUPPORTS=WCS_SERVER SUPPORTS=GEOS INPUT=JPEG INPUT=POSTGIS INPUT=OGR INPUT=GDAL INPUT=SHAPEFILE -->

<Service>
  <Name>MapServer WFS</Name>
<!-- WARNING: Mandatory metadata '..._title' was missing in this context. -->
  <Title>Rare_Earth_Element_Deposits</Title>
  <OnlineResource>http://mrdata.usgs.gov/</OnlineResource>
  <Fees>none</Fees>
  <AccessConstraints>none</AccessConstraints>
</Service>

<Capability>
  <Request>
    <GetCapabilities>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/cgi-bin/mapserv?map=/mnt/mrt/map-files/ree.map&" />
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Post onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/cgi-bin/mapserv?map=/mnt/mrt/map-files/ree.map&" />
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </GetCapabilities>
    <DescribeFeatureType>
      <SchemaDescriptionLanguage>
        <XMLSCHEMA/>
      </SchemaDescriptionLanguage>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/cgi-bin/mapserv?map=/mnt/mrt/map-files/ree.map&" />
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Post onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/cgi-bin/mapserv?map=/mnt/mrt/map-files/ree.map&" />
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </DescribeFeatureType>
    <GetFeature>
      <ResultFormat>
        <GML2/>
      </ResultFormat>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/cgi-bin/mapserv?map=/mnt/mrt/map-files/ree.map&" />
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Post onlineResource="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/cgi-bin/mapserv?map=/mnt/mrt/map-files/ree.map&" />
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </GetFeature>
  </Request>
</Capability>

<FeatureTypeList>
  <Operations>
    <Query/>
  </Operations>
    <FeatureType>
        <Name>ree</Name>
        <Title>Rare_Earth_Element_Deposits</Title>
        <Abstract>Information on mineral deposits containing rare earth elements from around the world with grade and tonnage, and mineralogy.</Abstract>
        <Keywords>
          mineral resources; mining and quarrying; mine sites; niobium; rare-earth elements; phosphorus
        </Keywords>
        <SRS>EPSG:4326</SRS>
        <LatLongBoundingBox minx="-179" miny="-89" maxx="179" maxy="89" />
        <MetadataURL type="FGDC" format="text/xml">http://mrdata.usgs.gov/metadata/ofr-2002-0189.xml</MetadataURL>
    </FeatureType>
</FeatureTypeList>

<ogc:Filter_Capabilities>
  <ogc:Spatial_Capabilities>
    <ogc:Spatial_Operators>
      <ogc:Equals/>
      <ogc:Disjoint/>
      <ogc:Touches/>
      <ogc:Within/>
      <ogc:Overlaps/>
      <ogc:Crosses/>
      <ogc:Intersect/>
      <ogc:Contains/>
      <ogc:DWithin/>
      <ogc:BBOX/>
    </ogc:Spatial_Operators>
  </ogc:Spatial_Capabilities>
  <ogc:Scalar_Capabilities>
    <ogc:Logical_Operators />
    <ogc:Comparison_Operators>
      <ogc:Simple_Comparisons />
      <ogc:Like />
      <ogc:Between />
    </ogc:Comparison_Operators>
  </ogc:Scalar_Capabilities>
</ogc:Filter_Capabilities>

</WFS_Capabilities>
